summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx for shipping services provided to NYSG LLC, detailing transportation charges and discounts. It includes shipment details, payment instructions, and adjustment request information.

persons.name: Gabriel Perahia
persons.context: Gabriel Perahia is listed as the sender associated with the shipment detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: Aluren Kyantener
persons.context: Aluren Kyantener is mentioned as the recipient of the shipment in the FedEx invoice.

events.title: Shipment Drop-off
events.description: The package was dropped off at FedEx for shipment.

events.title: Customs Entry Date
events.description: The customs entry for the shipment occurred on this date.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 4-628-04760 and the invoice date is March 7, 2003.
Total charges for the shipment amount to $20.80 after discounts.
The shipment was dropped off on February 28, 2003, and included a fuel surcharge.
Gabriel Perahia is identified as the sender and Aluren Kyantener as the recipient of the shipment.
The invoice includes instructions for requesting adjustments and details about the shipment's transportation charges.
